Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Match

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Match
public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
hamzahaddaoui Class related to a match. Linked to a certain billboard, and a list of players. The match moves through a list of predefined state, from the INITIALIZED to FINISH.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Match​(int matchID, Player matchMaster)
    Constructor that instantiates a new match; a game billboard is instantiated too.

  • Constructor Details

    • Match

      public Match​(int matchID, Player matchMaster)
      Constructor that instantiates a new match; a game billboard is instantiated too. The new match, is set on the GETTING_PLAYERS_NUM status The player that has created the match, is added immediatly and set as the current player.
      Parameters:
      matchID - progressive ID given to any existing match
      matchMaster - the player that has created the match

    • setPlayersNum

      public void setPlayersNum​(int playersNum)
      This method is used to set the players number of the match.
      Parameters:
      playersNum - the number of the players for the match. Can be either 2 or 3

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(Player player)
      This method is used to add a new player to the match. The players counter is increased too.
      Parameters:
      player - the new player being added to the match.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player player)
      This method is used to remove a certain player, that has lost, from the match. At first, the player is being removed from the billboard, and then removed from the players list This player then is added to the losers list. In fact, even if this player has lost, it keeps receiving updates from the match. At last, if there is only one remaining player, this is declared winner.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has lost

    • checkPlayers

      public boolean checkPlayers()
      This method is used to check the status of the match. If a player state is LOST, this is removed. Otherwise if a player state is WIN, this is declared winner, and the other players are declared losers.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Changes the current player.

    • setCards

      public void setCards​(java.util.Set<GodCards> cards)

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard​(GodCards card)

    • nextState

      public void nextState()
      This method is used to change the current state of the match. The match moves sequentially through the states described here: GETTING_PLAYERS_NUM -> WAITING_FOR_PLAYERS -> SELECTING_GOD_CARDS -> SELECTING_SPECIAL_COMMAND -> PLACING_WORKERS -> RUNNING -> FINISHED

    • start

      public void start()

      public void setMoveUpActive​(boolean moveUpActive)
